name: npm-paris-js
description: Slides for my talk about npm for Paris.js #33

scripts.build-js: cat lib/js/head.min.js js/reveal.min.js > build/js/slides.js && cp lib/js/html5shiv.js build/js/
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-img

author: Khalid Jebbari <khalid.jebbari@gmail.com>
